item.title: PowerShell DSC Resource Module to Install and Configure Windows Admin Center
item.description: Windows Admin Center (WAC) is the new web-based management application for managing Windows Servers, Failover Clusters, Hyper-Converged Infrastructure (HCI) clusters, and Windows 10 PCs.
